layout.singingstanza: God has made all things, The Cre -- a -- tor He— Ev -- ery -- thing that God cre -- at -- ed Was made per -- fect -- ly.

lyrics.stanza: God has made all things, The Creator He— Everything that God created Was made perfectly.
God has made all things, Made them perfectly— What a wonderful creation Everything we see.
God has made all things, Made them perfectly— What a wonderful Creator In His work we see!
